content: But the “posse” jibe stuck because it was tone-deaf, condescending, and — even if it was part of some mind game — nasty. The paternalistic reading lists and Zen Buddhism don’t play the way they used to. Maybe it was always bullshit and we just got better detectors. There is a certain mysticism we ascribe to Jackson’s teachings, and that can sometimes obscure the lengths he will go to in order to publicly manipulate people or denigrate their achievements.
